author: johnnyappleseedgate
body:
yes.

&#x200B;

I have worked jobs I loved that paid me 50% less than jobs I have hated.

I think it pays off in the long run because you tend to work harder at things you enjoy so despite the initial pay cut I suspect that 2-3 years down the line you'll be making more money than if you took a job you didn't like (because you will have put more effort in and people can tel you actually enjoy your work) AND you will have a job you like.
